# Question

Provide a clear, concise question.

# Context

Explain why you’re asking this now.  
Reference any relevant `.adoc` files, specifications, or exhibits.

# What You’ve Tried

Describe any steps you’ve taken to answer this yourself.

# Expected Outcome

What kind of clarification or guidance would resolve your question?

# Additional Notes

Anything else reviewers should know.
